resources.string: Please, make sure that you have connected the router with default settings. Configuration will be possible over WiFi only. When the app closes automatically, reconnect to WiFi with the password \"itremedy\". To set the speed limits open the app again, enter the password \"itremedy.pro\" and press CONNECT.
WAIT… Configuration in progress… Do not take the phone away from the router
Check your connection, input data or router settings. An error occurred:
Select a port, enter the maximum limit in megabits and press OK. \nFor unlimited speed enter 999. To turn the Internet off enter 0.
For the new router setup press SETUP NEW ROUTER. \n To connect already configured router enter the password \"itremedy.pro\" and press CONNECT

ImProvider enables you to control MikroTik routers through controlling router users' Internet speed limits. The users won't be able to connect each other. This version is suitable for 5-port routers MikroTik hAP series. For other models/functions use the premium version of the app. 
 How to use: 
 1. If you already use a Mikrotik router save its configuration with Winbox and reset it. 
 2. Turn on the router. 
 3. Plug the internet cable from provider's router into the first port (ETH1). 
 4. Connect your phone or tablet with ImProvider to WiFi network "MikroTik-*****" . 
 *If your router creates two networks, do not use "MikroTik-****A" during setup due to WiFi security. 
 To delete the app settings on your router reset it. 
 You can find more information about ImProvider at https://itremedy.pro/improvider. If you have questions or want to report about an issue please write to customercare@itremedy.pro. 
 We are not responsible for any harm done by using ImProvider. Pressing CONTINUE you agree with it.

Enter new Guest Wi-Fi network name and password (password can be blank), enter the maximum speed limit in megabits and press OK. \nFor unlimited speed enter 999. To turn the Internet off enter 0. You cannot manage MikroTik over guest Wi-Fi.
Your guest Wi-Fi network is ready. Please check it.
After automate closing the application, reconnect to Wi-fi network (if it was not done automatically), connect to the router and press GUEST Wi-Fi SETUP again to finish configuration.
After clicking OK, the program will send the settings and close automatically. If after the first attempt the network name has not changed, run the process a second time and the job will be done.
